home-information.title: Information about the anime
home-information.content: My Hero Academia (僕のヒーローアカデミア Boku no Hīrō Akademia?) is a manga series written and illustrated by Kōhei Horikoshi. It is based on a one-shot made by the same author and published in the fifth volume of the manga Ōmagadoki Dōbutsuen under the name My Hero.12 On January 11, 2015, a VOMIC based on the manga was released.

home-plot.title: Plot of the anime
home-plot.content: Boku no Hero Academia is set in a world in which 80% of the world's population has developed superpowers. These powers begin to appear at the age of 4 years of age of each individual and each one develops very different characteristics. Because of this, numerous superheroes and supervillains have appeared. Our protagonist, Izuku Midoriya, belongs to that 20% of the population that does not have superpowers but his great dream is to study at the U.A. academy and become a hero like his idol All Might.

home-functioning.title: Functioning of the website
home-functioning.content: On this website you can see a list of all anime characters in the LIST tab. You can access a detailed view of the character by clicking on his image.

about.title: Thanks for visiting my website!
about.acknowledgements: I hope you enjoyed it and learned things about the universe of my hero academy. But most importantly, I hope you start watching it if you haven't seen it yet, what are you waiting for!
about.github: Here is my github if you want to see other personal projects:
about.farewell: But before you go, always remember this...PLUS ULTRA
